metadata.title: USN-4231-1 -- NSS vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that NSS incorrectly handled certain inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4231-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libnss3-dev - 2:3.35-2ubuntu2.7 libnss3 - 2:3.35-2ubuntu2.7 libnss3-tools - 2:3.35-2ubuntu2.7 No subscription required
